modName: Add All Dragon Armors    light and heavy
summary: Adds all Dragon armors, both heavy and light
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]All Daedric Quest Items[/b][/center]

===== [b]Instructions:[/b] =====
DO NOT DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER. Download manually.

1. Copy the text file \"dragonarmor\" to:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

or 

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

or

C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\

depending on your version.

2. Start up Skryim
3. Load a save
4. When your character loads up: 
4a. Make sure you have spare space in your inventory. This mod will add about 162.5 weight of Daedric rewards.
4b. Type into console (press ` / ~ key) \"bat dragonarmor\" without quotes
Done :-D


I have 2 other scripts up at the moment (December 21st \'11), if you\'re interested:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4316]All Skill Books[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4314]All Daedric Quest Items[/url]

Adds all Daedric Quest rewards (you get both for the quests where you have to choose between two items).
author: Aypolo
